configurations.name: SwarmUI: Full Dev Server
configurations.command: Remove-Item Env:NODE_OPTIONS -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:HOST='127.0.0.1'; $env:PORT='4100'; fnm exec --using v22.22.0 npm.cmd run dev:local

configurations.name: SwarmUI: Full Dev Server (Port 4200)
configurations.command: Remove-Item Env:NODE_OPTIONS -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:HOST='127.0.0.1'; $env:PORT='4200'; fnm exec --using v22.22.0 npm.cmd run dev:local

configurations.name: SwarmUI: Next.js Only (Turbopack)
configurations.command: Remove-Item Env:NODE_OPTIONS -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if (!(Test-Path '.tmp')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path '.tmp' | Out-Null }; $env:TEMP=(Resolve-Path '.tmp').Path; $env:TMP=$env:TEMP; fnm exec --using v22.22.0 npm.cmd run dev:next

configurations.name: SwarmUI: Next.js Only (Cloud Stable)
configurations.command: Remove-Item Env:NODE_OPTIONS -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if (!(Test-Path '.tmp')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path '.tmp' | Out-Null }; $env:TEMP=(Resolve-Path '.tmp').Path; $env:TMP=$env:TEMP; $env:NEXT_DIST_DIR='/tmp/.next-swarm'; fnm exec --using v22.22.0 npx.cmd next dev -p 4000 -H 127.0.0.1
